channel.title: ERROR! "String index out of range: 2"
channel.description:
Help! When I run my server and log in, it works for about 1 minute then it displays an error in the server listener and echoes over and over the message i put in the subject. i look in my character folder and my file is completely empty. i never had this error before and i really need to fix this before i put my server online on saturday. please help! Thanks!
* Fixed... I figured it out already.
